Eddie Speed presents
"Alternative Financing for Today’s Economy"

During a lively overview Eddie Speed will discuss of the ultimate alternative financing tool - seller financing. You see the lucrative opportunities in brokering notes, creating notes on your own properties, and investing in seller-financed notes. He describes how the note busines works and how real estate investors can capitalize on the phenomenal growth in seller financing.

For the real estate investor, this growing demand for seller financing is creating a unique business opportunity with limitless potential. By becoming a Seller Finance Specialist, you can provide your expertise to realtors and individual property sellers alike—and earn substantial commissions for your services.

If you’re a realtor, you can create seller-financed notes for your clients, to overcome financing short-falls and to speed up transactions. You can also provide fellow realtors with your expertise as a Seller Finance Specialist, and get paid for it. The nation’s leading expert in seller financing will show you how.
During the 90 minute presentation on Thursday February 17th, you will learn:

  • The mortgage meltdown has a silver lining . . .
  • Real Estate Investors can actually profit from the implosion, turning that silver lining into gold.
  • The collapse of conventional lending has created a void that's rapidly being filled by seller financing.
    Increasingly, property sellers are carrying loans for their buyers. Increasingly, those notes are available for sale . . . and profit!
  • By creating real estate notes, investing in them, or simply brokering them, the investor can make substantial money with minimal expense.
  • The real estate investor requires very little additional knowledge in order to specialize in notes.
    Note consulting and brokering offers flexibility and convenience. Set your own hours. Work from the comfort of your own home.
  • And the best part is, you can earn 10% commissions from seller-financed notes without spending your own money!
